name: SmutStone
description: Enjoy the best of two worlds: an immersive fun card game and juicy fantasy erotica.

jobs.name: Claim Duels Chests
jobs.description: Claims duels chests, when they are ready.

jobs.name: Duel Fights
jobs.description: If there are empty slots, starts a few duels.

jobs.name: Campaign Fight Forest
jobs.description: Attacks an almost random place in the Forest (second campaign location)
jobs.details: It executes only when you have more than 50 energy and attacks only places you have already won.

jobs.name: Campaign Fight City
jobs.description: Attacks an almost random place in the City (first campaign location)
jobs.details: It executes only when you have more than 50 energy and attacks only places you have already won.

jobs.name: Open Bronze Box
jobs.description: Opens the bronze box in the store when it's available.
